definitions: in an ungainly manner; not smoothly or gracefully

examples.text: she waddled up the stairs awkwardly
he landed awkwardly after both of his vaults
the conclusion seems awkwardly grafted on to the main text

definitions: in a way that shows uneasy embarrassment

examples.text: Seth responded awkwardly, allowing the silence once again to settle between them

shortDefinitions: in way that shows uneasy embarrassment

definitions: in a way that causes difficulty

examples.text: the cruise control is placed awkwardly on the control column
the ball bounced awkwardly, but Auguste controlled it with his chest
